# Neblina Digital Inc. — Full Reference

> A digital product studio based in Ontario, Canada specializing in product strategy, design, creative direction, and privacy-first software development.

## Company Overview

Neblina Digital Inc. is a digital product studio founded by Gabriela Moreira. The name "Neblina" comes from Portuguese, meaning "mist" — representing the studio's approach of helping clients navigate uncertainty until clarity emerges. The studio operates a dual business model: sustainable consulting work in strategy, design, and creative direction, combined with proprietary product development.

## Consulting Services

### Product Strategy & Brand Consulting
Neblina helps teams define product direction, market positioning, and brand identity. The approach emphasizes intentional design over trend-chasing, with a focus on building with purpose.

### Product Design & Creative Direction
End-to-end product design including user experience research, interface design, and design systems. Neblina creates design systems that scale gracefully and respect users.

### Software Development
Full-stack development specializing in:
- Mobile applications using React Native and Expo
- Web applications using Next.js and TypeScript
- Backend services with Supabase
- Privacy-first technical architecture

### Technical Architecture
System design and technical strategy for teams that need scalable, maintainable infrastructure. Emphasis on modern tooling, developer experience, and long-term maintainability.

## Products

### Discloser
Website: https://discloser.app
A privacy-first iOS app designed to make sharing health test results feel safe and stigma-free. Users can upload a document, verify results through AI-powered analysis, and share via a link or QR code. No accounts need to be exchanged. Key features include:
- AI-powered document verification
- QR code and link-based sharing
- Secure result management
- No identity exchange required
- Built with React Native, Expo, and Supabase

## Philosophy

Neblina operates on core principles:
1. Privacy is a fundamental right, not a feature
2. Technology should empower people, not exploit them
3. Trust is earned through transparency and action
4. Intentional design over trend-chasing
5. Quality code that stands the test of time
6. Collaboration built on honest communication
7. Products that respect users
8. Architecture that scales gracefully
9. Partnership that extends beyond launch

## Technical Expertise
- React Native / Expo (mobile)
- Next.js / TypeScript (web)
- Supabase (backend)
- Tailwind CSS (styling)
- Framer Motion (animation)
- GSAP / Three.js (creative effects)
- Privacy-first architecture patterns

## Location & Contact
- Region: Ontario, Canada
- Website: https://neblina.tech
- Discloser: https://discloser.app
